happy.author: Werner Erhan
happy.quote: Happiness is a function of accepting what is.

happy.author: Steve Maraboli
happy.quote: Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them.

happy.author: George Sand
happy.quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.

angry.author: Laurence J. Peter
angry.quote: Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.

angry.author: Ford Frick
angry.quote: Keep your temper. A decision made in anger is never sound.

angry.author: Robert Green Ingersoll
angry.quote: Anger is a wind which blows out the lamp of the mind.

neutral.author: Vijay Shankar
neutral.quote: Be it high or low, it doesn't matter. I need to stay calm and neutral all the time.

neutral.author: Jesse Jackson
neutral.quote: Time is neutral and does not change things. With courage and initiative, leaders change things.

neutral.author: Simon Mainwaring
neutral.quote: Like all technology, social media is neutral but is best put to work in the service of building a better world.

surprised.author: Denis Waitley
surprised.quote: Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised.

surprised.author: Thomas Hardy
surprised.quote: Time changes everything except something within us which is always surprised by change.

surprised.author: Jose Ortega Y Gasset
surprised.quote: To be surprised, to wonder, is to begin to understand.

sad.author: Alyssa Milano
sad.quote: First, accept sadness. Realize that without losing, winning isn't so great.

sad.author: Gloria Estefan
sad.quote: The sad truth is that opportunity doesn't knock twice.

sad.author: Alfred Austin
sad.quote: Tears are the summer showers to the soul.

fearful.author: Sun Tzu
fearful.quote: If you know the enemy and know yourself you need not fear the results of a hundred battles.

fearful.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
fearful.quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.

fearful.author: Zach Wamp
fearful.quote: We should not be afraid to go into a new era, to leave the old beyond.

disgusted.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
disgusted.quote: The greatest pleasures are only narrowly separated from disgust.

disgusted.author: Petrarch
disgusted.quote: Sameness is the mother of disgust, variety the cure.

disgusted.author: Sophocies
disgusted.quote: All is disgust when a man leaves his own nature and does what is unfit.
